title: Image Quality and System Validation Engineer - Camera HW and Depth Group
summary:
Apple designs consumer electronics that have touched millions and changed how we interact and live. Imagine what you could do here. At Apple, new ideas have a way of becoming extraordinary products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Bring passion and dedication to your job and there's no telling what you could accomplish. Dynamic, hard-working people and inspiring, innovative technologies are the norm here. The people who work here have reinvented entire industries with all Apple products. 
Do you love working on challenges that no one has solved yet? The Camera HW and Depth group at Apple develops Depth and Image Sensing systems such as the revolutionary True Depth camera that powers FaceID and the recently released LIDAR scanner. This multi-disciplinary group of cutting edge engineers is responsible for architecture, design, development, characterization and validation of these highly complex sensing systems, aimed for Apple products. 
This team is looking for an Image Quality and System Validation Engineer to work on advanced cutting edge multidisciplinary system development.
description:
Be part of a core technology team developing advanced imaging and sensing solutions for future products. 
Own characterization, test, and validation / Image quality aspects of our ground breaking sensing systems, starting at the early phases (lab prototypes) till complete system maturity (Mass Production). 
Own entire test cycle from design of experiment including lab setups , test execution, analysis and report. 
Develop new Image quality / validation / characterization concepts and procedures. 
Conduct data driven analysis required for decision making.
key_qualifications:
3-5 years of multidisciplinary R&D background experience as a System / Characterization / Validation / SW  / User experience / Image / Video quality engineer
Deep understanding of electro optical systems along with design considerations and tradeoffs
Proven Hands-on experience with scripting languages - Matlab and/or Python
preferred_qualifications:
Proven Hands-on experience with:
Image quality metrics
Machine learning based methods for Image quality assessment
Lab automation of image captures, motion stages, robots
Familiarity with Image Signal processor (ISP) algorithms
education_experience: B. Sc / M. Sc / PhD in Physics or Optical / System / Mechanical / Biomedical Engineering
